entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -0.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 7:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon then light early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
